name: Geralf's Mindcrusher
oracle_text:
When Geralf's Mindcrusher enters the battlefield, target player mills five cards.
Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

name: Geode Rager
oracle_text:
First strike
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, goad each creature target player controls. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
flavor_text: Its crystalline core refracts light into chaos.

name: Generous Gift
oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
flavor_text: The best presents are impossible to regift.

name: Garruk's Uprising
oracle_text:
When Garruk's Uprising enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.
Creatures you control have trample. (They can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker they're attacking.)
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

name: Game Trail
oracle_text:
As Game Trail enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Game Trail enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

name: Furnace Whelp
oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Baby dragons can't figure out humans@-if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

name: Frontier Siege
oracle_text:
As Frontier Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of each of your main phases, add {G}{G}.
• Dragons — Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

name: Fortified Village
oracle_text:
As Fortified Village enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Forest or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Fortified Village enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

name: Foreboding Ruins
oracle_text:
As Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

name: Foe-Razer Regent
oracle_text:
Flying
When Foe-Razer Regent enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.
Whenever a creature you control fights, put two +1/+1 counters on it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Fleshbag Marauder
oracle_text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

name: Flameblast Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Flameblast Dragon attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, Flameblast Dragon deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text: He marks his territory with fire and wrath, etching the mountainside with his charring breath.

name: Fires of Yavimaya
oracle_text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Yavimaya lights the quickest path to battle.

name: Fiery Confluence
oracle_text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Fiery Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature.
• Fiery Confluence deals 2 damage to each opponent.
• Destroy target artifact.

name: Felidar Retreat
oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
• Create a 2/2 white Cat Beast creature token.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.

name: Feed the Swarm
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.
flavor_text:
"On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."
@-Skyclave inscription

name: Favorable Winds
oracle_text: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.
flavor_text:
"Like ribbons of wind and wisdom the coatls fly, twisting mystery into truth, shaping the clouds to suit their inscrutable will."
@-Huatli

name: Farhaven Elf
oracle_text: When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "Verdant bloom does exist. It merely hides for its own safety."

name: Faerie Formation
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}{U}: Create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying. Draw a card.
flavor_text: The throng flitted from castle to castle, leaving a trail of star-crossed love, damaging rumors, and missing heirlooms in their wake.

name: Explosion of Riches
oracle_text: Draw a card, then each other player may draw a card. Whenever a card is drawn this way, Explosion of Riches deals 5 damage to target opponent chosen at random from among your opponents.
flavor_text: "You've got how much gold there?"

name: Ever-Watching Threshold
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent attacks, if they attacked you and/or a planeswalker you control, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"You think they know we're here?"
@-Orlo, goblin raider

name: Eternal Witness
oracle_text: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

name: Eternal Skylord
oracle_text:
When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have flying.

name: Enter the God-Eternals
oracle_text: Enter the God-Eternals deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain life equal to the damage dealt this way. Target player mills four cards. Amass 4. (Put four +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Empyrean Eagle
oracle_text:
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.
flavor_text: All the birds of the skies are the spirit's brood, gathered for safety under its wings.

name: Emeria Angel
oracle_text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
flavor_text: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

name: Elfhame Palace
oracle_text:
Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
flavor_text: Llanowar has seven elfhames, or kingdoms, each with its own ruler. Their palaces are objects of awe, wonder, and envy.

name: Elemental Bond
oracle_text: Whenever a creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I want to help Zendikar. Show me the way."
@-Nissa Revane

name: Drumhunter
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may draw a card.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: "I feel the vine-rhythm as my friends drive the beast to me. I will not miss my mark."

name: Dredge the Mire
oracle_text: Each opponent chooses a creature card in their graveyard. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: Fortunately, the reanimation spell just missed the long-dead colony of dung scorpions.

name: Dream Pillager
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Dream Pillager deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.
flavor_text: Its wings shimmer with dreams absorbed from its enemies.

name: Drakuseth, Maw of Flames
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Drakuseth, Maw of Flames attacks, it deals 4 damage to any target and 3 damage to each of up to two other targets.
flavor_text:
"Spread out, you idiots! Spread out!"
@-Marsden, party leader, last words

name: Dragon Tempest
oracle_text:
Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
oracle_text: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
flavor_text: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

name: Dragon's Hoard
oracle_text:
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.
{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Dragonmaster Outcast
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor_text: "This world will be ruled by its rightful sovereigns, not these hideous pretenders."

name: Dragon Mage
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
flavor_text: "You'll bend to my will@-with or without your precious sanity."

name: Dragonlord's Servant
oracle_text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

name: Dragonkin Berserker
oracle_text:
First strike
Boast abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate for each Dragon you control.
Boast — {4}{R}: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

name: Draconic Disciple
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Draconic Disciple: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor_text: "If I am to die, I will die in the embrace of immeasurable flame."

name: Distant Melody
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
flavor_text: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts@-on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

name: Dismal Backwater
oracle_text:
Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Where the holy light of the angels has shone, only purity remains.

name: Diregraf Captain
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever another Zombie you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: Though its mind has long since rotted away, it wields a sword with deadly skill.

name: Dimir Signet
flavor_text: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members@-and the doomed.

name: Diluvian Primordial
oracle_text:
Flying
When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.
